siteMetadata.title: Colm Doyle
siteMetadata.subtitle: Thoughts on Technology, Developer Relations and more.

frontmatter.title: Avoiding the comfort trap
frontmatter.description: Everyone should get in the habit of interviewing themselves for their own jobs. Here's my advice on why, and it's probably not what you think.

frontmatter.title: Why you should answer every single recruiter InMail
frontmatter.description: Most people think of recruiter InMails as spam, but not me. I see opportunity in every one.

frontmatter.title: Developer Relations in 2022 - Where I'm focusing
frontmatter.description: What does 2022 hold for Slack Developer Advocacy, and the industry in general? There's two big things I know my team will focus on.
